name: 白檀小町
description:
So-called monster, basic it is due to the description of the man, describe the characteristics and presence gives the devil, also represents the description of what age or region fear, and over time some fear has become difficult to understand, so some monster characteristics and presence are blurred, sandalwood monsters in the small town is such a group of want to hone their fuzzy "features" shape "presence", in short, is a group of strange personality specious.

All the characters in this game are over 18 years old
